page.title: 06A LOCAL FARM (THE GLEN)
page.content:
The Glen has 9 acres of land and 4 people work there, it has been there for 62 years. 8.5 acres of the farm was a hop field. Mr Knight owns The Glen and grows sprouts, sweet peas, parsnips, cabbages, cauliflowers, potatoes, onions, broad beans, walnut trees, tomato plants, lettuces and mushrooms. Mr Knight is the only mushroom grower in Eastbourne. Mr Knight grows 70,000 lb of mushrooms a year. They have 3 tractors and 3 mushroom sheds. The mushroom sheds are kept warm and the mushrooms are kept in darkness. Mr Knight grows a lot of flowers like magnolias, lupins, lavender, and lots of others. { {************************************** {By Deborah Gomm age 11}
The Glen is at Dickens Way, Langney
